### Key Statistics

```{python}
#| echo: false
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objects as go

# Sample organizational data
data = {
    'Year': [2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024],
    'Projects': [15, 23, 31, 42, 58],
    'Team_Size': [8, 12, 18, 25, 32],
    'Client_Satisfaction': [4.2, 4.4, 4.6, 4.7, 4.8]
}

df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Create interactive chart
fig = go.Figure()

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(
    x=df['Year'], 
    y=df['Projects'],
    mode='lines+markers',
    name='Projects Completed',
    line=dict(color='#1f77b4', width=3),
    marker=dict(size=8)
))

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(
    x=df['Year'], 
    y=df['Team_Size'],
    mode='lines+markers',
    name='Team Size',
    yaxis='y2',
    line=dict(color='#ff7f0e', width=3),
    marker=dict(size=8)
))

fig.update_layout(
    title='Our Growth Over Time',
    xaxis_title='Year',
    yaxis=dict(title='Projects Completed', side='left'),
    yaxis2=dict(title='Team Members', side='right', overlaying='y'),
    hovermode='x unified',
    height=400
)

fig.show()
```

```{=html}
<script>
// Add some interactive elements
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Smooth scrolling for anchor links
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')).scrollIntoView({
                behavior: 'smooth'
            });
        });
    });
    
    // Add animation on scroll
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };
    
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.classList.add('fade-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);
    
    document.querySelectorAll('.content-block').forEach(el => {
        observer.observe(el);
    });
});
</script>
```
